page.title: 11OUR HOUSES (Continued)
page.content: 3.My house is"Broadway House"on the main A355,Beaconfield Rd.The original house was called"Dunholme"built 1903. At one time greengrocers owned it,so there is a huge garage for their lorries.It fell into disrepair and was divided illegally into flats.Tramps and squatters slept downstairs.The name "Broadway" dates from the 1950's.We moved in there,1971.We made many alter- ations and even found a secret staircase! 4.I live in one of the original servants' cottages,now on the A355,of the big house "Ingleglen"no longer there.It is one hundred and twenty years old.My house still has some beams mainly in the kitchen.In 1984,some of the ceiling collapsed and my bed landed in the kitchen.Luckily,I was not in it!
